title: Effacement
description: When recording every aspect of your life has become the law, what happens when your connection to the world is severed? With the advent of BioNarratus’s Vitasync neurochip, serious crime has all but disappeared. Without a lifelog you can’t get a bank account, medical insurance, or a job. But a government agency is bent on using the neurolink tools Cole Westbay helped develop to target and kill potential enemies. After uncovering a clue to their plans, he wakes the next day with his neurochip destroyed and his recent memory wiped.A renegade executive and an enigmatic attorney become Cole’s new allies in a fight against the clock. Targeted by a single-minded government agent, he must discover the plot and stop to more innocents from being murdered before they shut him up permanently.
author: Hieronymus Hawkes
